COOKIES

What are Cookies?

Cookies are small files that get put on your computer by websites as you use them. These cookies can store information which can have privacy implications. You can find out more about cookies here

Google Analytics

This site uses Google Analytics. This is a service provided by Google. They gather anonymous data of how people are using this site and then provide site owners with visitor statistics, details of page views and more. If you don’t want us to see how you use this website you can opt-out of being tracked by Google Analytics here. Here are the cookies I know that this site uses. If you identify any more, please let me know.

# Cookie Used For
1 _gid responsible for tracking user behavior. Expires after 24 hours of inactivity
2 _ga used to identify unique users and expires after 2 years

Twitter

This website displays embedded tweets and Twitter may set cookies. For more details on what information Twitter collects, please visit their website
